Description.SourceString: If it glows, it goes.
Do bones.
I think we did a pretty good job, so far.
Don't forget to call your mom.
Thank you! Yes, YOU! If you weren't playing this game, all of us would have to be working on something else. And working on DbD is just awesome!
I was here.
Sometimes you don't realize it but your ears are actually very scared.
Did you know that the footstep sounds are actually the sound of real feet recorded in their natural environment? No feet were harmed or endangered during the recording process.
The loud chase music is here to cover the sounds of the survivors in order to give them a chance to escape.
When all seems lost, boop the snoot for extra chance of survival.
Who put confetti all over my code?
Is it already bugged?

Back before Alpha, Matt Cote asked for some name suggestions for the Killer who eventually became The Trapper. Being a goof, I suggested "Chuckles". Turns out other folks liked it and that was his in-game name up until Beta! He'll always be my sweet boy.
Sometimes I make extra icons and put them in the build files for people to find. What could they mean? So mysterious...
You will pry Urban Evasion from my cold dead hands. I love the scooch too much!
Please don't kill me! I have kids and children!
Seeing cosplays and fanart of the characters we create is so damn wild!
Hi Mom!
99 little bugs in the game, 99 little bugs. Take one down, patch it around, 103 little bugs in the game!
Why are you running? The fun is just beginning!
Is this a feature or a bug?
While everyone was fixing generators in playtests, I was fixing them for real!
Your lucky coin will be unlucky, tough luck.
Don't you dare drop that pallet on me, Justin!
Well, this doesn't look right...
In theory, it should be working.
Have you tried playing DbD while commuting to work?
Yeah, it's probably supposed to bend that way.
Overalls Friday! Join the movement!
Looks like The Wraith's Mori file location has moved. Ring a bell to anyone?
Everything is fine...
Self-Five!
Work on your cardio, it could be useful!
Even if you're a noob, you still have a place in the party. Being the bait is a huge honor!
An engine change a day keeps the doctor at bay.
Did you know that "Rin" is the 4th most popular name for newborn girls in Japan in 2019? "Yui" is the 8th!
Did you know that hitting a hooked Survivor is called "Kebabing" in Japanese? Because it looks like slicing Kebab meat!
The Wraith is considered as the most adorable character by a part of the Japanese community. You can find some awesome fanart if you're lucky!
Rough day? Here, have some bubble tea.
Dbd is a vibe.
All of your fan art and cosplays amaze us! Keep it up.
Help, I'm trapped in the entity realm!
Bunny Who?
Only in the games industry could you hear this sentence on the job: I vomited on the school sign and it crashed.

When we first got the audio treatment for The Plague, she made these disgusting retching sounds while holding the power. It was really horrible in an awesome way, but it was just too much for the final release.
In the sequel "Deed by Daylight", you perpetually fix generators for an orphanage while singing carols.
I'm not dead! I'm getting better! I think I'll go for a walk.
const char msg [] = {65,32,119,105,110,110,101,114,32,105,115,32,121,111,117,46}; (Editor's Note: Sometimes Remi has trouble speaking human)
We eat a lot of chocolate in the office. Like, a lot.
During lunch break we play some DbD games. Who knows, maybe I played against YOU!
The game, the map, the game...
Open the gates!
Where's Carl?

Did you know that The Huntress always hums a popular lullaby known to every Russian person? The lyrics are: Don‚Äôt sleep too close to the edge of the bed, or little gray wolf will come and bite your tiny flank.
During closed Alpha back in Spring 2016, Chuckles and Banshee were the prototype names for The Trapper and The Wraith.
OK, this one's gonna be the best map!
May I cleanse the very Totems I hid? Or is it considered cheating?
That feeling when you run out of pallets to use and the killer is still after you...
We are very excited to start Dead by Daylight Year 4 with you and want to thank all the players who continue to engage with our game every day. Happy 4th anniversary!
I never thought I'd be scared back into the closet!
Programming is just a series of IF and ELSE statements.
lnsert funny quote here
My personal mission is to view every single piece of DavidxDwight fanart out there. They sustain me. Keep 'em coming!
To the rest of the CS team and the ACMs: I am nothing without you. Thank you for all your work over these 4 years!
I can be bribed with a good spreadsheet or pretty charts. Not pie charts though - those are heresy.
I named The Clown's perk Pop Goes The Weasel. No joke, that was my idea.
Horror games are my favorite, and I've always wanted to work on one. Working on DbD is a dream come true!
A key aspect of surviving a trial is not dying.
Take to the stars and explore new realms in the upcoming spinoff adventure, 'Hillbilly Space Program,' coming to a sloped rock near you!

When developing The Plague, we had discussions about whether to model the attack like a vomit assault rifle, a vomit flamethrower, or a vomit shotgun. Not only did 'Vomit Assault Rifle' end up being the direction we went with, it's also a great name for a band.
Let there be dead by dayLIGHT!
How many dead cows are in the game?
Connection with this quote could not be established. Please try again.
To whoever posted 'actual braindead survivor please avoid at all costs' on my Steam profile in 2018, it's still true!
The game you're playing right now was created by some of the finest developers and team I've ever met.
No, you can't put that as a quote for the 4th Anniversary.
You'd think by now I wouldn't get jump scared!
I can't wait until you guys can see [REDACTED]!
Acting Jane was an incredible experience and I am glad that I was chosen to do her voice!
Be happy, enjoy, and have fun! <3
Fact: Diversion should be called Pebble.
WAH!
I started to play Survivor when The Nurse could Blink 7 times. I like to say that I learned DBD on hard mode.
Hey, thanks a lot for playing the game!
Good luck in your upcoming trial.
Is this the real life or is this just Entity?
We actually play the game. But not the role you play.
YEEHAW!
I'm a terrible source of quotes.
No, please, I don't want to add anymore quotes to the database for this event...
This is for you, long lost friend; it was an honor to work with you. You kept me energized and motivated. To the best cup, may we remember you forever. Cheers!
Happy anniversary to a remarkable and beautiful community! Wow, already four years old! You have grown so much. Thank you for the shared laughs, the memories, and for the support over the years!
The only ice cream flavors available in the Entity's realms are 'Horse Flesh' and 'Pain'.
One of the key secrets to DbD music is that I use a hammer to hit my instruments!
Living the dream.
No, I‚Äôm the other Matt. With three T‚Äôs.
I don't get it :|
Happy 5 years, Dead by Daylight! It has been an incredible journey.
Look, we did NOT nerf the booty.
Thanks for playing! I'm just so happy to do my part behind the scenes for the game, so have fun and enjoy!
Thanks for playing! While I have your attention, please remember to stay hydrated by drinking lots of water!
I don't know about you, but I would like to read some of those nice books on those shelves. Curiosity doesn't kill too often... does it?
I can still hear her humming when I sleep
So I heard you want more cake in the game.
Gaming is great and all but when's the last time you read a good book?
This was a dream come true to work on the Silent Hill map. We made sure the fans would find details from the original game. Are you sure you found all of them?
Who would have known that those small statues staring at you could be so creepy. Rest assured they are still staring even while you are not playing...
Claudette and I both started out in science, ended up with DbD. At least I only have to deal with the Entity during office hours.

'twas a lovely Monday morning. Oatmeal was the breakfast offered at Behaviour that day. Vomit was one of the main topics during the morning daily standup.
What a great combination.

Working from home has been great for my cat.  She found the power button to the PC.  When hungry, she sometimes turns off the PC.  Typically during a meeting.  Twice when I was presenting something.  Most importantly, she got fed early.
Misa brevis et spiritus maxima
I regret to inform you that we were not able to bug Pyramid Head's butt being nerfed
It was a childhood dream to work with Silent Hill characters!
He's sexy and he knows it!
#TeamFelix
Can we talk about how fun Deception is? I live for Deception plays. Keep 'em coming!
Seeing all of the fanart that was created so quickly after the reveal of the All-Kill chapter was amazing. Thank you for your support!

The Trickster's unique personality inspired me to create the most complex breath and voice system in the game to date. We had the chance to work with a Korean sound studio and voice actor to capture the real nuances of the character - and he's the first killer to speak!
Happy 5th, DbD! It is a thrill to work with all of you every day! I'm always amazed at your talent and your spirit! To many more!
Even in difficult times, let's keep our heads up and support each other!
Keep smiling!
Don't be afraid to take on new challenges!

For my first day at Behaviour, the first task my team gave me was about the Stranger Things chapter. They ask me to prepare a playtest to test the Demogorgon and the two Survivors Nancy and Steve. I knew that day, that I had the best job ever!

I felt nothing but excitement when I first watched the All-Kill trailer, especially being a huge K-pop and anime fan! As an intern, it's been such a unique experience to see everything come together and everyone's reactions to it :~)  wooooo

I still remember how I felt when the Halloween Chapter was announced. Seeing such an iconic character in DbD opened up so many opportunities for where the game could go. Five years later, look how far it has come!
Obviously I'm #TeamFelix. Can't say no to that 'stache. Anyone on #TeamDavid is just incorrect.
This Nea cosmetic is hands down my favourite in the entire game!

Feature... or bug... Feature... or... bug...
*Consults The Auris*
Bug.
Look, all I'm saying is, technically Jigsaw never directly killed anybody...I'm sorry, what was the question?
If you are expecting actual tips and tricks from this quote you will be disappointed.
After the recent Huntress Add-on Pass, we hope our players are enjoying new combinations and synergies between her Addons and various Perks. My personal favorite new Add-on is Wooden Fox!
Solo Survivors have been asking for a way to count Totems for a long time. We hope they are enjoying the recent Small Game update!
I know - I nearly fainted when The Trickster winked at me, too!
Don't forget to keep your friendly community managers well-hydrated, placed in direct sunlight, and sprinkled with a hefty dose of puns & dad jokes. Oh, and fan art. Never forget the fan art!
If at first you don't succeed - scream, scream, scream again! Or hide in a locker. I hear that works, too.
It feels like Christmas every day when we get to work on a game this fun with a community that's this great!
For every thought I have that I'm finally getting better at the game, I find another clip to prove me wrong. Y'all are one talented bunch!
The only Myers main that never gained a tier.
Louder for the people in the back: WAH!
Y'all got anymore of them Bloodpoints?
Part of my job is to approve memes. I like my job.

This community is amazing. The talent, the passion, the creativity and the love you have for our game, that's what drives me! Thank YOU for being a part of something that matters so much to so many people, you are all going to be stuck with me for a long time.
#TEAMDAVID
Can you offer our Player Support Lead a nice egg in these trying times?
Elodie and Charlotte are actually having a really intense staring contest. It's been going on for six months.
If you're quick, you can probably make it to the bathroom and back before the match starts. I believe in you.
You forgot to switch that perk again, didn't you?
"Oh no, he's hot!"
Don't talk to me or my great-great-great-[...]-grand-daughter ever again
Me trying to run away from my problems and responsibilities
Shout-out to the lovely folks working on Dead By Daylight Mobile! Their sass truly knows no bounds.
We all know that one person that will try and boop the snoot no matter what when they find out the killer is The Pig.
Those crazy youths are at it again with the vaulting, stabbing, and running away.
Oh, look, it's a demo puppy. Who is a good demo puppy? You are.
Which one of you zombie rabbits wants the next carrot?
Look Meg, so many retro outfits for us to wear during the trials.
One day, I'll succeed flashlighting a killer... maybe...
I play with self-care and I'm not ashamed! #NoobPride !

Title.SourceString:
Aram
Economy Game Designer on Mobile

Description.SourceString: This is for all my friends telling me that my Spirit addiction was "just a phase".

Title.SourceString:
Aram
Economy Game Designer on Mobile

Description.SourceString: My favorite part about working on Dead by Daylight is the memes. What a wonderful community!

Title.SourceString:
Aram
Economy Game Designer on Mobile

Description.SourceString: I'll definitely use The Huntress' lullaby to make my kids fall asleep.

Title.SourceString:
Aram
Economy Game Designer on Mobile

Description.SourceString: Feeling cute today, might give you the hatch...

Title.SourceString:
Aram
Economy Game Designer on Mobile

Description.SourceString: Happy to be part of this incredible adventure! 13/10 would dev again!
My thoughts while making the Trickster's Starstruck icon : This icon doesn't look sass enough...
*taps the arrow key* This vector needs to be 3 pixels to the right... no... 2..
So where IS everyone? ‚Ä¶oh.
"They look like monsters to you?"
Finally... MY name is in the credits! But, what shall I do with all of this intoxicating power?
I love working on Archives challenges... hope you enjoy them, too! More to come!
Thank you, Player Support team for putting up with my madness for five whole years now. I love you.
I'm regularly bullied by the Community Management team because of a dream I had about Danny Devito.

Yep, I'm still on my mission to see all that ART. 
Thank you to everyone who has tweeted all that good stuff to me!
The DBD cosplayers never fail to impress me! If you see some strange lady giving you a double thumbs up at a convention, there's an 85% chance it's me.

For the first Archives, I did the voices of both kid Claudette and her mother. But every time I raised my voice to make it sound child-like I would descend into fits of laughter. I feel like that recording was like 70% wheezy giggles.
The colour of the Tomes in the Archive trailers isn't random. It matches their colour when they are placed in the Archive Compendium.
The logo we released for the Summer BBQ event is my third favorite icon in DBD.
I wonder if anyone will ever figure out why I put all those unused icons in the game files... I guess I'll have to spell it out.
Does anybody still remember Carl the Cashier?
During a playtest there is nothing more satisfying than landing a hit and hearing somebody across the office scream.

I'm curious how people would react to things we say out of context...
"Could you kill me real quick i need to test something"
Sniping people with hatchets since 2017
I helped!... Moral support is help, right?
Everyone asks "Where's the killer?" but nobody asks "How's the killer?"

When the community yells at you, it's because they care about you.
It's when they go silent, that you should be concerned.
You should run now. So I can chase you.

I can't imagine that a game that I localized as a volunteer with others got together back in 2017 is now one of the greatest hits in decades with tens of millions of players! Salute to all contributors back then.

Hida, Yui Kimura's birthplace, is the real city in the central part of Japan.
She was featured in Hida's newspaper and mentioned by their mayor when we released this Hida outfit!
Change my mind: Elephant Clown is the best outfit in the game. We are truly proud of the authors of the contest outfits and the community that brought us super inspiring designs such as this one!
Fun Fact: The Oni, Kazan Yamaoka, had different names in the development. Kenji, Kazuya... At last, we chose Kazan over Kojiro! Which one would you have given to him?
Don't you dare swing your axe on your own!!
Hope you enjoy the Anniversary!!
"Cakes are better when shared."  -- The programmer who bakes and brings cakes

Quite a few years of big success and so much potential to keep growing! This is how I would describe DbD. I have just joined the UI team and I can't wait to participate in making the game even more fun with so much new content!
Awaiting  Joey's face reveal ;)
I make environment props covered in blood and dirt - coolest job I've ever had
I don't like to wear jeans, even though I sometimes do. Is it only me?
The Nurse was the first killer whose power was not a physical object to be held, but it was still programmed that way even if you can't see it. The item she holds is called the "blinker!"
W-what are you going to do with that big club, Oni-chan?
Ever since Mr. Puddles was released, I don't think I've ever unequipped it.

What happens when you try to kick a volcano?
You Krakatoa!
I've got this awful disease where I can't stop telling airport jokes. My doctor says it's terminal
When do you stop getting jump scared by The Spirit? Asking for a friend...
If you're having fun, you've won this trial no matter the outcome.
As a die hard fan nothing makes me happier than seeing you love this game as much as we do.

Still one of my favorite killers to play, and the first release that I was at BHVR for as well!
WAHHHH!

You wanted lore? Oh, you're getting it alright! The Archives has been such a big part of my life on DbD ever since I joined the team - I hope you're all enjoying it as much as the team is working on it for you!
Who IS this mysterious Observer, after all!?
This event was truly the start of a crazy three years, finally culminating in the event story's Alchemist being released as our killer, The Blight! It was a long road there but we did it!
As our first two community contest outfit winners, I just need to say... y'all are as stylish as you are twisted. Keep it up!
Oh, lord, he comin' down that chimney. Throw anything on this mass of a man and watch him pull it off.

To all the Dwights out there with Killers to impress
It's easy to do just follow these steps:
1, Get Dwight-in-a-box costume.
2, Put your Dwight in that box.
3, Killer tries to open the box.
And that's the way you do it!
It's my Dwight in a box!
Boing! Boing! Bunny Feng remains one of my favorite outfits in the game. If you see me on Feng, you know I'm rocking the bunny ears.
Seeing Silent Hill in DbD was quite the surreal moment. There are very few more storied franchises in the survivor horror genre.
Oink, Oink!
I love hanging out with my friends! And what a good looking sweater they have too!
Just gimme The Blight
Man, I could go for a big steak right now
It's been real fun setting up in-game events & sales!
Sausage and red onions. Best pizza toppings.
Klaatu Verata Necktie
Do you know? We had to hire a buffoon who came up with such remarkable puns as the Pro-Pain Hammer because our dev team is very serious.
Only The Strong Survive
At the start of a game, for every second I can't hear a hearthbeat, my anxiety increases.
I can't tell how much I am proud to work with such an amazing team, a story that proves that no matter how small you start or where you're coming from, perseverance pays off.
When I play with friends we all have codes to make our actions ''efficient''. We like to nickname the killers - the vacuum, bing bong, cone head, Mickey‚Ä¶
The Goddess demands her sacrifice!
K-Pop Music to die for!
I've unlocked more life goal achievements on DBD than in my entire life, working on my favorite Horror licenses was a big childhood dream for me.
The entire team worked hard on the rework, I feel lucky to work with so many talented people!
Our fans are amazing, seeing all those great cosplays and fanarts based on our game as been a big motivation for me. Thank you!
Bringing a K-Pop chapter to life has been a real challenge but a greater satisfaction. Thank you for all the positive feedbacks on the chapter campaign. It is the best reward!
OH, NO! NOT THE BEES! NOT THE BEEEEEEEEES!
FREE HUGS!
Which outfit do you think is the best?
Cannot connect to online quote services. Please try again later.

As a huge DBD nerd, it's a dream come true to work on the game! The first DLC I worked on here at BHVR was the Silent Hill Chapter so Cheryl and The Executioner will always have a special place in my heart.
Loved working on this Archive release, especially as we learned more about The Hillbilly's backstory. Poor police dogs, though.
Bubba can really pull off the lady outfit! At least, better than I would...
My power girls! I'd love to see a TV show based on these characters, maybe we could call it "Riverdead"?
I spent 20 years of intensive research and immersion to prepare for this chapter. The KPOP fan in me was extremely happy, I couldn't count the bubble teas I drank while working on it.
As an Asian girl who loves to do kendo and swordsmithing, you'd probably figure out why Rin Yamaoka will forever be my DBD bias.
Can I write a private joke for a random player?... HI DRAX!
Backend devs are like ninjas. Nobody knows we were here until they see [insert error message].
Forever and always Jane Romero main <3
Hey, you! Yes, you reading this. You're awesome! xox
Sending lot of love and glitters to all of you. Thanks for sticking with us.
Eggs.

"Let's do a yukata Spirit outfit"
"Well, how about a mermaid Spirit outfit with gills and fins"
"Hell yeah!"
Happy 5th anniversary to an incredible team and community. It is a privilege and joy to share this adventure with all of you. I raise my glass to many more!

Joining our ever-popular "Horse Flesh" and "Pain" delights, a brand new ice-cream flavor is added to the universe to celebrate Dead by Daylight's fifth anniversary. Prepare to amaze your taste buds with "Buttered Horse Pain."
Eventually, it'll all make sense. I promise.
Cheats are never fair, and it's my job to eliminate them :)

Don't leave open gates before the job is done.
In the Clock Tower awaits a treasure for one.
Multiple times, this treasure can be found.
But escape soon, or be put underground.
You're STILL on mute!
